title: Searge: 正在准备快照
author: a20001017
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2014-6-25 21:57 编辑 

Searge: Just adding one or two new bugs, then we are ready to build a snapshot. Half of our worldgen code is migrated to block states, yay.
Searge: As always, I've hidden a new feature that you guys can try to find once the snapshot is out. Another new feature is less hidden, use /help.
Searge: No, we don't have time to test the snapshot before release, that's the reason why we make them in the first place, to get feedback on bugs.


Searge: 刚刚又出现了1~2个新漏洞，修复之后我们就可以准备一个快照啦！一半的世界生成代码已经能够兼容“方块状态”啦，耶。
Searge: 与平时一样，我隐藏了一个新的特性，你们能在快照出来以后找找。还有一个隐藏较浅的特性，用 /help问问！
Searge: 不，我们没时间在发布前测试快照，这就是我们优先就发布他们的原因，得到关于漏洞的反馈


14w26a
